title: Police use tear gas, water cannon amid rioting over Covid restrictions in Netherlands
content:
1. Police use tear gas, water cannon amid rioting over Covid restrictions in Netherlands  NBC News
  2. Dozens Arrested, Thousands Ticketed As Dutch Protest New Virus Lockdown Measures : Coronavirus Updates  NPR
  3. Covid: Dutch PM Mark Rutte condemns curfew riots as 'criminal violence'  BBC News
  4. Anti-lockdown rioters clash with Dutch police in two cities in the Netherlands  Guardian News
  5. Riots explode across Netherlands over covid restrictions, with Dutch leader calling participants criminals  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 荷兰因限制科维德而发生骚乱，警方使用催泪瓦斯、水炮。
荷蘭因限制科維德而發生騷亂，警方使用催淚瓦斯、水炮。
